General.Name: Saigon Thuong Tin Real Estate JSC
General.Description: Sai Gon Thuong Tin Real Estate Joint Stock Company primarily engages in the real estate investment and development business in Vietnam. The company engages in the residential, commercial, and industrial real estate construction activities. It also trades in real estate; invests in and constructs infrastructure of industrial parks and urban areas; provides financial, consultancy, broker, property auction, and land use rights auction services; constructs other civil engineering works; offers management consulting services; conducts market and public opinion surveys; manufactures building materials from clay soil; warehouses, factory and office leasing; and provides architecture and related technology consultancy, as well as specialized design services. The company was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
